body:
So while I was banned I was thinking about all the upcoming features to avicus. Mostly on nebula. We are going to be getting CTW! But I was think about a a new gamemode that I'm not sure if it exists already. 
Here it goes:
it will be a bebula styled map. 10 minutes on the clock. Each team has 1 - 3 monuments. Every kill is 1 point, BUT you can mine the monuments, and they will be 5 points. 
After a monument is destroyed the player will be teleported back to spaen and the obsidian will be replenished by a spawner or something. To make it a bit easier for the rushers( since you can keep going back) the defenders will not be able to build around a certain radius of a monument(Kind of like capture the wool)

I know the wording and formatting is really bad, if someone can fix it that would be appreciated!
